Drag and drop an image here, or click to select

Upload an image to crop

FAQ

Is my image sent to a server?

No. All processing happens locally in your browser.

How do I crop an image?

After uploading, click and drag on the image to select the area you want to keep. You can resize the selection by dragging the corner handles.

Can I move the crop selection?

Yes, click and drag the selection box to move it around the image.
